content:
Public stream created by Adam Topaz. Description:

Discussion related to the Masterclass on Formalisation of Mathematics, University of Copenhagen, June 2023.

hope you don't mind me pasting these links here so I find them quickly.

event website:
https://www.math.ku.dk/english/calendar/events/formalisation-of-mathematics/

announcement stream:
